name: architecture-review
description: Architecture review checklist for code quality assessment

checks.name: Clear Module Boundaries
checks.description: Modules have well-defined responsibilities and boundaries

checks.name: Consistent Directory Structure
checks.description: Directory organization follows a consistent pattern

checks.name: Appropriate Nesting Depth
checks.description: Directory nesting does not exceed 6-8 levels

checks.name: No Empty Directories
checks.description: No orphaned empty directories in the project

checks.name: Consistent Pattern Usage
checks.description: Design patterns are used consistently throughout

checks.name: Appropriate Pattern Selection
checks.description: Patterns match the problem they solve

checks.name: No Pattern Overuse
checks.description: Patterns are not used when simpler solutions suffice

checks.name: Single Responsibility Principle
checks.description: Classes/modules have one reason to change

checks.name: Open/Closed Principle
checks.description: Open for extension, closed for modification

checks.name: Liskov Substitution Principle
checks.description: Subtypes substitutable for base types

checks.name: Interface Segregation Principle
checks.description: Specific interfaces over general ones

checks.name: Dependency Inversion Principle
checks.description: Depend on abstractions, not concretions

checks.name: Low Module Coupling
checks.description: Modules have minimal dependencies on each other

checks.name: High Module Cohesion
checks.description: Related functionality grouped together

checks.name: No Circular Dependencies
checks.description: No circular import/require chains

checks.name: Appropriate Abstraction Level
checks.description: Dependencies flow toward abstractions

checks.name: No God Classes
checks.description: No classes with excessive responsibilities

checks.name: No Deep Nesting
checks.description: Control flow nesting kept shallow

checks.name: No Magic Numbers
checks.description: Numeric literals are named constants

checks.name: No Long Methods
checks.description: Methods kept under 50 lines
